title: This player is toxic he made me feel so bad
body:
player (name removed) dw riot i put ** so no one can find him but you {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

he sed 
you're actually a fucking retard
you think you're a teemo main with that shit?
8:52 pm
lol?
8:51 pm
complete waste of a man
8:53 pm
ahaha
8:51 pm
don't bother playing again you are so tragic

After game he added me and then we talked a bit not that nice.

I did not report him as i could not after the game was done and i left the after game screen.

replies.body: You need to learn to spell, ontop of that if someone harassed you in game, why would you assume they suddenly want to be your friend.

Players like this made my first few experiences playing League really not fun at all.

They aren't just toxic they are ... compensating.
{{item:3115}} 

Shrug it off.  
{{summoner:13}} 
Realise that they are having the exact effect they want if you don't shrug it off. 


**Cheers, **
**Cap' **
man i dont give a shit what anyone ses my point was that riot dose not do shit all they do is say they care and when you point something out they just push you under the rug
